code_value: Questions 1~2  Your classmate Jane has just got a Christmas gift, a new dress, from her mother. You ask her two questions about the dress.</br>Questions 3~4  Your best friend attended a wedding last Sunday. Ask him two questions about the wedding.
Questions 1~2  Your classmate Jane has just got a Christmas gift, a new dress, from her mother. You ask her two questions about the dress.
Questions 3~4  Your best friend attended a wedding last Sunday. Ask him two questions about the wedding.
